posts.post_content:
A simple 1/1 one-drop with a drawback? Seriously, what the heck?...  
  
Anyways, i'd like to see this as a keyword ability. Something like "*Bellicosity*" would be nice i guess. This would enable abilities that refer to creatures with that ability, and as such also interesting effects that give advantages to this drawback. Then this guy could even find use in a deck.
